text: Mirrankkar is a plane featured in the graphic novel Mezlok's Challenge . Cities and villages of Mirrankkar all carry their own Shokal stone. Some inhabitants of the plane are powerful mages, and a competition is held in which each city or town chooses a duelist. Mirrankkar was invaded by New Phyrexia's Machine Legion . Blue-skinned humanoids Thorun (global capital city) Gordahn (village) Mezlok Taishiar Tezzeret
